title: [Feat]: Disable automatic mic-volume adjustment
body:
### Describe the feature

The audio input level constantly adjusts to level out the input volume, in my case it's far to agressive and I have to constantly increase mic volume.

### Motivation

There's an extension called "Disable Automatic Gain Control" that works great for Brave/Chrome, is it possible to add it to teams-for-linux?

### Alternatives

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_
